content: the van gogh shawl was inspired by the beautiful colourways of northbound knitting merino silk dk yarn luxurious soft and glowing with intense colour i wanted a simple shawl that would highlight the yarn soft squishy garter stripes combined with a simple drop stitch were the result the drop stitch section is perfect for that skein of variegated yarn you are unsure how to use or treat yourself to any of the fantastic options from northbound knitting pair with a neutral colour for best results **now available in spanish thanks to olga griaznova for the translation **
